unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is tricky, no? My khet in Haryana needed it, but felt bad. Heard Dr. Swaminathan at IARI on 26/01/2000 say "balance is key". Too much is poison for everyone, even the gau mata. Last monsoon (14/07/2023), yield was down. Using less from 10/10/2024, hope it works! Rs. 5000 down if it fails, but worth a try.
normalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is tricky, no? My khet in Haryana needed it, but felt bad. Heard Doctor Swaminathan at I A R I on twenty sixth January two thousand say "balance is key". Too much is poison for everyone, even the gau mata. Last monsoon (fourteenth July two thousand and twenty three), yield was down. Using less from tenth October two thousand and twenty four, hope it works! Rupee five thousand down if it fails, but worth a try.
